content:
I think I just noticed a mistake that has been around for a long time. The security pages are currently assigned to FHIR-I, but should be owned by Security WG. -- security.html, secpriv-module.html, and security-labels.html
I wonder if this is why the security wg is getting so few CR on these pages?
Can we please assign these properly to security wg?
we would assign them on from FHIR-I - so that's probably not the reason you're not getting tasks
I think this is a mistake...? I'm happy to reassign them
@John Moehrke, perhaps send an email to Melva to ensure she knows how to triage security-related content.
